entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Dementors are dark creatures that feed on human happiness. They were sent down the street by an unknown person.

entities.name: patronus
entities.description: A Patronus is a magical entity created to protect against dementors. It was cast by the barman in response to the dementors.

relationships.description: The Patronus was created to target and protect against the Dementors.
